Ok, about the Firearm situation: Firearm is half-burned into the 
shield right now. That would mean that most attempts to pick him up 
would be futile. The chains especially would fail (I was in a hurry 
posting at school and didn't realize that), and probably so would 
Menasor's and anyone else's grabs. However, Firearm is in stasis lock 
and can't move at all, so I can't really post for him being moved; 
the person moving him would be responsible for posting for it.
